alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 8:06PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cheyenne County through 745 PM MDT... At 706 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunol, or 14 miles east of Sidney, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lodgepole and Sunol. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 70 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
